channel.title: DeathlyHallowsX|Dungeonerring|Summonning|Nomad
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4968/logoboa.png[/img][/center]
Okay So this server Is Based On InsidiaXv1(hardly coded) Still has some bugs to fix,I require Developers this will be released soon.A pic of it:-
[IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/7879/serverq.png[/img]
What we have got which others don't have -699 gameframe sprites -508 Maps with Wilderness Ditch(Not finished) -Nex(Missing Animations) -Near Perfect Dungeonerring -Basic Summonning -PKing Skill -Loyalty Titles 100% not 99% -Castlewars (Not Finished) -PK point System -Near Perfect Combat -Completionist Cape,Veteran cape,death cape,etc. -
[center][size=18pt]Client Developers[/size] None [size=24pt]Web Designers[/size] Me [size=24pt]Graphics Designers[/size] Me [size=36pt]Beige[/size] Me[/center]
If you want to work on my server,your pattern enterview should look like this:- [code]Name: How can you help my server(Web/Server/Client/Graphics,etc.): Link to your work: Age: Skype:[/code]
What I can do myself:- Graphics Designing:- [IMG]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/3603/adbannerp.gif[/img]
Web Designing:- Runescape like website didn't make screenshot yet because I didnt finish it.
Server Sided:- Added Loyalty Title with all bugs fixed myself
Regards Ayush Arya

item.title: DeathlyHallowsX|Dungeonerring|Summonning|Nomad
item.dc:creator: @Feerox Feerox
item.description:
@Feerox wrote:

[quote=“Project Amazed Carlos, post:2, topic:509689”]Looks bad, 317 loading 700 cache…
The chatarea looks awful too.[/quote]

I have to agree, the scroll bar doesn’t carry the look & Feel, same thing with the exit button on the equipment bonus window, it looks out of place.

Besides that, you say you have things that other people don’t have, but I’m pretty sure I’ve seen unfinished wilderness ditches and “Near Perfect Combat” before, In fact, the top 10 servers on mopar server list probably have “Perfect Combat”/“Near Perfect Combat” listed as a feature.

Read full topic
